exercises.question: Translate to German: Do you eat?
Translate to German: Do you drink water?
Translate to German: Do you play football?
Translate to German: Do you cook pasta?
Translate to German: Do you learn German?
Translate to German: Do you read?
Translate to German: May I drink tea?
Translate to German: May I cook rice?
Translate to German: May I read?
Translate to German: May I sit here?
Translate to German: Can we play cricket?
Translate to German: Can we eat now?
Translate to German: Can I go home?
Translate to German: Can we drink coffee?
Translate to German: Can I sleep now?
Translate to German: May I open window?
Translate to German: Can you give me water?
Translate to German: Can you give me phone?
Translate to German: Can you show me room?
Translate to German: Can you bring me cola?
Translate to German: Can you tell me name?
Translate to German: Which pizza do you have?
Translate to German: How many pizzas do you have?
Translate to German: Which phone does he have?
Translate to German: Which cola do they drink?
Translate to German: How many brothers do you have?
